name: Iron Golem
uniques: Eliminates combat penalty for attacking over a river
Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: An entity built by Minecraftians with reference to blueprints found within the ancient ship which had carried their ancestors. These golems will help the Confederation in gaining a temporary advantage early on, but will prove less useful as technology progresses.

name: Builder
uniques: Can speed up construction of a building
Never appears as a Barbarian unit
